projectCreation.title: Did you know?
projectCreation.content: It's easier to find the projects when you organize them into workspaces using Label Studio Enterprise.

projectCreation.title: Did you know?
projectCreation.content: Try Label Studio Starter Cloud, optimized for small teams and projects.

projectCreation.title: Did you know?
projectCreation.content: You can control access to specific projects and workspaces for internal team members and external annotators using Label Studio Enterprise.

projectCreation.title: Labeling for GenAI
projectCreation.content: Label Studio has templates available for supervised LLM fine-tuning, RAG retrieval ranking, RLHF, chatbot evaluation, and more.

organizationPage.title: It looks like your team is growing!
organizationPage.content: Assign roles to your team using Label Studio Enterprise and control access to sensitive data at the project and workspace levels.

organizationPage.title: Want to simplify and secure logging in?
organizationPage.content: Enable Single Sign-On for your team using SAML, SCIM2 or LDAP with Label Studio Enterprise.

organizationPage.title: Did you know?
organizationPage.content: Label Studio now has a Starter Cloud offering optimized for small teams and projects.

organizationPage.title: Share knowledge with the community
organizationPage.content: Have questions or a tip to share with other Label Studio users? Join the community slack channel for the latest updates.

organizationPage.title: Did you know?
organizationPage.content: Label Studio supports multiple points of integration with cloud storage, machine learning models, and popular tools to automate your machine learning pipeline.

projectSettings.title: Save time with Auto-Labeling
projectSettings.content: Use automation to instantly label large-scale datasets without sacrificing quality in the Enterprise platform.

projectSettings.title: Did you know?
projectSettings.content: Try Label Studio Starter Cloud, optimized for small teams and projects.

projectSettings.title: Evaluate GenAI models
projectSettings.content: Combine automation plus human supervision to evaluate and ensure LLM quality in the Enterprise platform.

projectSettings.title: Did you know?
projectSettings.content: You can connect ML models using the backend SDK to save time with pre-labeling or active learning.

authPage.title: Auto-labeling with Prompts
authPage.description: Use LLMs to instantly pre-label thousands of tasks with accurate predictions.

authPage.title: Evaluate and compare LLMs
authPage.description: Compare accuracy, cost, and performance on your tasks with Label Studio Prompts.

authPage.title: New Feature!
authPage.description: You can now label multi-page documents like PDFs.

authPage.title: New Enterprise Feature!
authPage.description: Save time by labeling many tasks at once with Bulk Labeling

authPage.title: Did you know?
authPage.description: Try Label Studio Starter Cloud, optimized for small teams and projects.

authPage.title: Did you know?
authPage.description: There's an Enterprise version of Label Studio packed with more features and automation to label data faster while ensuring the highest quality.
